website_summaries.verdict: Gives you a bit more power than other corded handheld vacuums that weigh less than 3 pounds.
pros: At only 2.8 pounds, this is a handheld vacuum that's easy to carry anywhere
With a 20-foot power cord, you'll be able to work for longer periods of times without having to move the cord to a new outlet
Can empty the dirt cup with the touch of a button
cons: No option to run from a battery
Doesn't have the built-in tools that some other models offer

customer_reviews.title: Pure garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Pure garbage. Worked for a couple days, then the rubber band for the roller fell off. The way they have the roller keyed means you can't reverse it - which you need to do to keep the band spinning DOWN to stay on the spindle instead of UP to pop off. Once it's jammed back onto the spindle, it pops right off instantly when you power on the vacuum. The included 'tool' is worthless. I had to use a heavy screwdriver to put enough tension to slip it over the spindle. I need something that doesn't fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Farvision Networks

customer_reviews.title: DIRT DEVIL IS THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 dirt devil vacuums now, and I will swear by them. They are a brand name I will stick with forever. I use this hand held vacuum for my furniture. I have a cat, and am obsessed with NOT having pet hair on my furniture, so I use this every day. I've had a dirt devil vacuum for 8 years now and it's still the best vacuum I've ever used!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: A Little Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because this was the only handheld that didn't have complaints about it blowing extra air out the sides while vacuuming, and it's a Dirt Devil, the same as my main vacuum cleaner. Well, it does blow out a bit. Don't get me wrong, it does a good job of picking up stuff, but even with the filters, there still some blowback. It's okay.
customer_reviews.author: I. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: It sucks up cat fur off sofas and beds really well.
customer_reviews.text: I HATE to vacuum and am inclined to therefore hate all vacuum cleaners. But I have Persian cats and and can't have everything made of wood or tile. I find cordless vacs useless and have owned the slightly larger "classic" version of this one. The old one is cracked and a mess, so I decided to buy a new one. I was in a hurry and couldn't find the exact model of the old one, so I bought this one. surprisingly, it works really just as well as my old one and it's smaller, lighter and a lot quieter. I'm as happy with it as I can be with any vacuum
customer_reviews.author: J. Masden

customer_reviews.title: It does seem to have great suction. I only wish that there was a ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is a litter smaller then I expected. Despite it's size it works well on my stairs, which is what I purchased it for. It does seem to have great suction. I only wish that there was a different way to store the cord. The only problem I have had with it is the belt seems to slip off, I'm thinking that might be due to the amount of pet hair it picks up. I have had no other problems then having to reattach the belt a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Danyel

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this little bugger!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any of the issues with this one that others have had with belts yet. So far it's quiet and has great suction and brush beating. My wife is amazed at how much pet hair she got up even after using her regular vacuum first. I got it for her to do our stairs with. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing ever. The belt fell off everytime i tried to use it. I returned it after a few days of using it. Return process was easy. So I’m thankful for that.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month of light use.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for two months I use it once a week to vacuum my stairs and couch, light duty so two weeks ago the belt fell off. I read the instructions and fixed it, it promptly came off again and you have to unscrew the belt cover. so now? the screw is broken and you can't get it off. you can't remover the cover to fix it. it broke AFTER USING IT ONCE!!! it's cheap plastic and breaks after the first use. I wouldn't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: MisLaDonna

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR VAC.
customer_reviews.text: BASE DOES NOT FIT SECURLY EVEN IN LOCK POSITION. USED 2 TIMES BELT FELL OFF--UBABLE TO FIX DUE TO SCREW SET IN TOO FAR & UNREACHABLE. CALLED CUSTOMER SERVICE TOLD WHERE TO GO TO GET IT FIXED. (PURCHED 9/28/18) SORRY I BOUGHT IT!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cusati

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for carpeted stairs, including those with lots of pet fur!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specificaly for my carpeted stairs which get horribly coated in fur from my pets. Using a regular vaccuum is really a pain, the upholstery brush attahment barely dows anything on the steps, and dustbusters generally aren't built for that stuff. This little baby is light, has a long enough cord that I can plug it in and do all my stairs without having to move it, AND does a pretty awesome job!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Treisner

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This little hand vacuum has tons of suction. I have an older model of this unit and that's why I bought another one. Boy have they improved it! I have had Shark vacuums through the years and they quit working after very little use, and didn't have hardly any suction. I always ended up throwing them out. This dirt devil is definitely a keeper!.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Cleanout Latch Breaks
customer_reviews.text: These are great and powerful vacuums. Extra long, high quality power cord, great suction, etc, etc. But I have bought two different models of these Dirt Devil handhelds and BOTH latches on the cleanout cover broke within a few months. I have to hold them closed with duct tape. It's a real hassle to have to untape them to empty the cleaner and then retape. BOO !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Fine until you need to access the belt
customer_reviews.text: I'm an ace at changing the belt on a Dirt Devil. Did it for many years on my original DD. Can't do this one. It requires removing an impossibly deep-imbedded (virtually invisible) screw in order to remove the belt cover. No amount rotation would release the screw. You can tell it has rotated, but it doesn't advancing out. Device is six weeks out of warranty. I plan to smash the belt cover to put the slipped-off belt back in place. With proper belt replacement it should last more than 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva

customer_reviews.title: Belts engineered to fail. Sucks in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have stated, the first use I can really smell the brush belt burning from friction. Is it any wonder they include an extra one in the box? I'm sure I will be buying more of these from the company after the ones they gave me fail, but I'm just guessing so don't take that as fact. It does a great job of cleaning. It's a very compact size and I use it in my RV. I like the syling, as it looks very cyberpunk haha
customer_reviews.author: Customer232323

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum really sucks ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is awesome. I read the reviews before buying and they are accurate. Works great on my steps and couch. That’s all I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: rachel gresham

customer_reviews.title: Lots of suction, but belt falls off (right out of the box).
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an old Shark. This unit has great suction and picks up dirt quickly. However, after using it out of the box FOR ABOUT 1 MINUTE the belt fell off. I've now spent far too much time trying to get it back on and watching videos where users can't do it easily. I'd like to meet the engineer who came up with this pull and twist idea. Most shafts have collars on to hold the belt. It's a real shame that users also say that belts continue to break very frequently. Great motor, but if you spend all of your time replacing belts, why buy this Dirt Devil??
customer_reviews.author: BLC

customer_reviews.title: due to the poor design of this product it was impossible to open ...
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy this Product. After a couple of uses the factory installed belt slipped and needed to be reset. However, due to the poor design of this product it was impossible to open the "door" to reach the belt for resetting. The screw to open the "door" is in a 1-1/2" deep well that is the width of the screw head. The screw refused to turn even though the screw driver was the appropriate size. The Dirt Devil Hand Vac is now in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Lena-Marie Inserra

customer_reviews.title: I actually looked for a vacuum that had a cord because I am not too good at keeping things charged
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my sewing room to clean up little bits of thread and paper and such that accumulates on the floor. I have only used it a handful of times so far, but it has worked well. It is a very powerful little thing! I actually looked for a vacuum that had a cord because I am not too good at keeping things charged, so this one was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Vac for stairs, and good for furniture too.
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT little vac. I use it on our stairs exclusively. I have 2 dogs that shed and track stuff in the house. They go up and down the stairs a lot and this vac is perfect for quick clean up. It has a brush that works great, and the suction power on this unit is very good. It is very easy to empty, takes just a few seconds to dump out that back side of the unit. Highly recommend if you are looking for an easy way to do stairs, it is also good for furniture.
customer_reviews.author: BV Cody Dog

customer_reviews.title: A proven product
customer_reviews.text: We have used these handheld vacuum cleaners by Dirt Devil for years. This one appears to be an improved version, lighter weight and easier to empty. It continues to clean very well with good suction and brush action on wood or carpet floors. It is a very good vacuum for cleaning cars also. Life is better because of this product.
customer_reviews.author: GDavis

customer_reviews.title: Inferior belt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to vacuum my stairs. The belt broke during the second use. That's probably why I smelt burning rubber the first time I used it. It came with an extra belt but that won't be useful if it lasts the same amount of time as the first.
customer_reviews.author: fyford

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic housing, horrible design. Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Just like others have said, but the belt didn't break, it just came off when I spun the bristle drum by hand, half hour later, I had reinstalled the belt, maybe 8 times, each time almost breaking the cheap plastic housing and it fell off everytime. I'm returning this and I just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I like the suction power of this machine. It's sturdy enough to get the job done yet not overly heavy to use on stairs and such
customer_reviews.author: Lor A

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I debated against using a more portable wireless handheld, but many had battery issues either after so many months or the charge in general wouldn't last long. The cord on this model is very long which makes it a lot easier to use, but what I like best most of all -- I can use it non stop wherever I want and I don't have to worry about the suction dying off because the battery is losing juice. It stays strong all the way through! It picks up dog hair like a dream. I use it on my couch and pillows and you'd never think I had a dog who we like too much to kick off the couch
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Handy - perfect size for stairs, but suction could be way better.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect in every way for stairs except that it’s suction leaves something to be desired. Emptying the bin is disappointing, esp since I know what to expect from my bigger, bulkier shark.
customer_reviews.author: KatinHat

customer_reviews.title: Works great on flat surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This did an amazing job cleaning the floor mats of my car, took them out of the car to get them on a flat surfaces. Doesn't do well with crevices, but it isn't designed to I don't think. One complaint would be the device itself was covered in dust, etc after use. Presumably from the beater bar kicking stuff up not that the filter thing wasn't working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Get it Done
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is a nice design in its shape and functionality, and is very lightweight -- the problem is, it's super weak! This is a 2 amp corded vacuum - it has as much power as a lot of cordless hand vacuums. Totally unacceptable. Dirt Devil had an older version of this, the "Classic," that was an amazing 7 amps of power. That thing could really suck. This one, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product when it works
customer_reviews.text: Great product when it works. Pain in the ... to change belt. Customer support non-existent (pretty much “we do not know what the problem is, figure it out”).
customer_reviews.author: barracuda

customer_reviews.title: Great for stairs.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our stairs. It was exactly what we bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Space efficient, useful.
customer_reviews.text: Just right. Small enough to fit in small space, yet powerful enough to do the job. Cord easy to store, but long enough so don’t need to plug/unplug all the time. Great appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Swansong

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little vacuum, so light weight and awesome that it is bag less. Make sure you check if the belt is attached, some people reviewed that the belt broke when they first used it but if it was not attached it will cause it to break. like any new item some assembly is required. I used this to vacuum my 2 stair cases on my house and it worked great no issues this will also be great on my sofa's
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Belt broke on second use. Replacing belt is difficult and the new belt keeps coming off. Customer service not very informative or helpful. Do NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: William C Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Smells like burning rubber almost immediately after turning on
customer_reviews.text: Spits dirt and rocks all over. Smells like burning rubber almost immediately after turning on.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little hand vac. Only downside started smoking a little bit after 3 weeks of use. Still works but starting to notice the smell keeps coming back. Might be time to retire it after only about a month of use. For that 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Keeloaf

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum picks up dirt and hair well but dust was leaking out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Redjoel

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Had the bag version of one of these several years ago. That thing ran forever until the bag wore out. I was happy to find an updated model. Plenty of power and suction. Excellent for pet hair on the couch. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: David's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil Bagless Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Item worked for awhile, then belt cut. Replaced belt and it cut instantaneously. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Deek

customer_reviews.title: Poweful Tool
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this model Dirt Devil hand vac. Amazing job on steps, and I did not find the noise level to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Powerful and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is light weight easy to use, and it has a long cord. It has a lot of power and really does a great job on everything. It does an amazing job picking up cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Avoid ever buying this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum gets easily clogged with a small amount of hair and then the drive belt falls off. The screw that lets you access the drive belt to reassemble is very difficult to use. We have only had this vacuum a few months and we have had to disassemble the vacuum 3 times! It's ridiculous and we will are very disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thurmer

customer_reviews.title: Good work horse
customer_reviews.text: I wish I got this years ago. It doesn't run out of battery juice because it's not cordless (my cordless ones don't have enough power and don't last long). I can use this all day long and not worry about batteries dying and no-suction power.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, effective Hand Vac
customer_reviews.text: Super little light weight hand vac. We had an older dirt devil model and it died after many years of service. Love this newer model; it's lighter and you don't need bags - just empty the canister. I use it on furniture, steps and along base boards. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kayde

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had some sort of a crevice tool ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had some sort of a crevice tool. This is my only vacuum cleaner for the one room of my house that's carpeted, so I should have thought to look for that. But it does the job as advertised. I haven't used it enough to address how well it holds up for long-term use.
customer_reviews.author: Rea Clute

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Belt broke after vacuuming four carpeted steps. Went to apply replacement belt included, screw to open belt hatch will not unscrew from the plastic. Returning for a refund. Will try another model of another maker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum cleaner, portable and powerful. I use this vacuum occasionally and primarily use a Roomba that takes care of the house day to day. This does help pick up small items and I find the cord is essential - as I need the power a corded vac provides. The portability of this vacuum is also a huge plus, and no bags = a great product.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Simple and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I bought it to vacuum carpeted stairs. I like the long cord.
customer_reviews.author: xxx

customer_reviews.title: Okay but does not exceed any expectations
customer_reviews.text: I've done this for several months and it does work although the suction isn't as strong as I would have liked for vacuuming stairs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but made a terrible burning rubber smell that never went away
customer_reviews.text: Worked as a vacuum, but made a terrible burning rubber smell that never went away.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: was as adertised, and arrived in a timely manner. little bit expensve though.
customer_reviews.author: jimco

customer_reviews.title: VACUUM AWAY SMELLY ODORS
customer_reviews.text: TERRIFIC. I cleaned the odors right off my bed. Sprinkled my bed with Baking Soda and White Vinegar and then vacuumed everything off the bed with this product. The terrible odors were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suction
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It vacuums my stairs with excellent suction. Quick and easy. It has a cord so no running out of charge.
customer_reviews.author: esther saada

customer_reviews.title: Small and compact.
customer_reviews.text: It's great to clean my couches and bed mattress. But I purchased this for a friend of mine because he wanted mine ?? This unit works great for boats and small places.
customer_reviews.author: jorge paupreto

customer_reviews.title: Nice little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for little messes and our stairs, works great for those purposes!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly O.

customer_reviews.title: It works great on cat hair
customer_reviews.text: I used to have one I gave away & now I have one again! It works great on cat hair!!! Thanks, LOrrie
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Rostad

customer_reviews.title: It did a great job of picking up even relatively large pieces of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this handheld vacuum to clean my carpeted studio. It did a great job of picking up even relatively large pieces of dirt. The machine has a nice weight and an actual brushroll. I've only used it once, so I can't comment on its longevity, but it does feel sturdy. This is NOT for thick, plush carpet though -- I tried this on a plush bathrug and quickly smelled burning rubber. I'd only use this on flat carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Belt issues, do not use on delicate surface.
customer_reviews.text: Belt fell off at 2nd use, difficult to put back. Bottom surface if metal, can scratch or leave marks on delicate surface
customer_reviews.author: TM Tei

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new vacuum for my stairs. Lightweight. Works great. Like the really long cord (or atleast it’s longer than my previous one). Emptying it is a breeze. Have just used it the one time so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Works great on pool table
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean my pool table. For the price it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex in Springfield

customer_reviews.title: mother in law liked ours so much we had to order her one ...
customer_reviews.text: mother in law liked ours so much we had to order her one of her own, then the sister in law saw it and we had to order her one too!!!
customer_reviews.author: T&M GiaD52

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately when we go to use it..
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately when we go to use it .. it spits dirt and particles back at us through the side vents if I could return it I would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works good cleaning up cat litter and using on my steps and back of furniture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a hand vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Is a powerful vacuum with very good style and functions, clean dirt without trouble.
customer_reviews.author: mikedomo

customer_reviews.title: Good while it still works
customer_reviews.text: It was great for vacuuming while it lasted but I wouldn’t expect it to last for long. It broke within 6 months of use. Probably used 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Livingston

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: The power button has to be held for it to work, very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Brooks

customer_reviews.title: horrible. I know it is a cheap vacuum but ...
customer_reviews.text: horrible. I know it is a cheap vacuum but this one is not worth a dime. does not keep dirt in container and little to no suction.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falty belts
customer_reviews.text: This vacuums belt broke 7 minutes into use. they supply you with an extra belt but that means that that cuts my vacuums life in 1/2. Refund?!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Noah

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil is Divine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in order to vacuum my stairs and it works great. I wish there was some way to use a crevice took, but does what I was hoping it would do. The cord is long enough to do a complete flight of stairs and it works well at picking up dog hair. Highly recommend. I love the hands-free way you can enjoy the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stairs.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for stairs. Portable and light weight. Great suction and handling.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hudanick

customer_reviews.title: Hand Vac
customer_reviews.text: Received my Dirt Devil in a timely manner and it works great. Love the dirt cup holder instead of having to replace bags. Washable filter is a great feature too. I was recently diagnosed with a variety of allergies and wanted a small hand held vac to vacuum my bed and furniture only. This vac is working great for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Fans on the side blow your dirt everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The holes in the side blow out very strong. So if you're trying to vacuum up light things such as dust bunnies, crumbs or cat litter, this will make it harder to clean, not easier. Fail.
customer_reviews.author: FilmDailyNews

customer_reviews.title: which I love. I use it for my stairs and furniture
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum works amazingly well. The canister is small so it requires frequent emptying but I'm ok with that. The wire is long, which I love. I use it for my stairs and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Great for SMALL Clean-ups
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough for quick clean-ups. Not too heavy or bulky but you've got to keep your thumb on the button to keep it working.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Gio

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is the best way to vacuum stairs. Picks up all the dirt and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: It work fantastic! work very well for being so small and ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to use in a sleeper truck. It work fantastic! work very well for being so small and portable. It is very strong and powerful for the job it is meant for. I recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable. Not worth getting this slightly cheaper model.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January. I have already had to fix the belt twice, and now it quit running altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not vacuum in cracks, but okay for surface dirt
customer_reviews.author: L. Entsminger

customer_reviews.title: It's dependable
customer_reviews.text: Dirt Devil is always a dependable choice, but I really wish they modify it to include a crevice tool with hose...
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great suction and love the fact that you do not need to use a bag.
customer_reviews.author: celtic piper

customer_reviews.title: Belts tend to break
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these now, and both times, the belt busted. The belts are so dang hard to put on, I end up just having to buy a new one. No longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hood

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: I turned mine on made noise then just stopped and didn’t work, tried to Sind it back, it would cost me over £40.00 to send it back, so it will be going to the skip, strongly advise not to buy.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. It is compact and good quality and I am back to using a handheld with a cord instead of battery that runs down too soon. So far I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ahappy65

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to use, fairly easy to empty, and pulls up a lot of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Z

customer_reviews.title: Hand Vac it's great
customer_reviews.text: The cord winds up onto itself, I cleaned 16 steps on the carpeted stairway and wow did it suck up alot of stuff, easy to clean (I used my wall mounted shop vac. in the garage) and I'm ready for more. At least the wifey is happy I'm running around the house cleaning. lol
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter. She loves it. Vacuums her steps very well.
customer_reviews.author: maryjkb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: GOT THIS FOR MY DAUGHTER. SHE LOVES IT FOR THE STAIRS
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Lasted two weeks vacuuming the carpet surrounding the wood stove and then just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on our stairs. It works great. The suction is very powerful. The vacuum is light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: lacks the suction power that dirt devil is know for, wish it had some attachments
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I did not like that the vacuum was covered in dirty dust
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works. I did not like that the vacuum was covered in dirty dust.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne  Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Radical
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is the bomb. Works very well. Only complaint is that the belt is easily prone to falling off, but they are aware of this and give you the proper tools. Great product and great shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Suction is great however the belt keeps coming off. (not hard to put back on)
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I have full body wide spread chronic pain and I was looking for a tiny vaccum that would be easy for me to lift and vaccum with. This was way too heavy. I have thumb, wrist, forearm, elbow, collar bone and sternum pain that is aggravated by moving this vaccum and I need something more lightweight. For an ordinary person this would not likely be a problem. But if you suffer from weakness or pain, this likely will be too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowStorm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall! Even a 7 year old can do it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this so our 7 year old son could vaccuum the stairs easier. It is incredibly light, has excellent suction and he can empty it himself! He is so excited to have a job he can do himself! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Longaker

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Be careful when using it because the band thing comes off really easily and putting it back on is a pia! We use it on our sofa to pick up pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: kelli

customer_reviews.title: Can’t change the belt!’
customer_reviews.text: Well it works well enough but you can forget changing the belt!!! Ridiculously difficult!!!! I have not yet been successful! Grrrrr.....
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my new sweeper , much lighter than my eureka and alot of suction. The cord is also nice and long. I would tell any one to get this sweeper.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary P.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for the stairs in our house
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, in order and works as described. Great vacuum for the stairs in our house, which are carpeted. Haven't used in a car or on hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Depraved

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect, but does a very good job. Much easier to vacuum the steps then trying to use a full size vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.author: H.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to use. Suctions well and perfect for vacuuming stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Light

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stairs
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to clean my steps. I have 3 dogs that constantly shed and it did a great job getting all the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Jewell
